meanings.definition: A network protocol used to access and manage remote computers.
meanings.sent1: I used telnet to connect to the server and check the files.
meanings.sent2: Telnet allows you to remotely control another computer over a network.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer go to therapy? It had trouble with its telnet connection!
meanings.sent4: The telnet protocol acts like a virtual tunnel between two computers.
meanings.sent5: Using telnet feels like reaching out and controlling a computer from afar.

meanings.definition: To establish a connection using the telnet protocol.
meanings.sent1: I will telnet into the server to troubleshoot the issue.
meanings.sent2: He telnetted into the mainframe to retrieve the data.
meanings.sent3: Why did the internet break up with the telnet protocol? It couldn't handle the long-distance relationship!
meanings.sent4: She telnetted her way through the network like a digital explorer.
meanings.sent5: Telnetting into the system felt like stepping into a virtual doorway to another world.
